page.title: 15]]]]] Village Health [[[[[
page.content: Mrs.Bailes gave birth to a baby boy, John,on 3rd June,at the John Radcliffe Hospital, Oxford.She went into hospital at 16.00 hours, and after having the amniotic fluid released by the doctor, the baby was born at 23.38 hours. He weighed 3.77kg at birth and was normal.Mrs.Bailes stayed in hospital for four days, and she had visits from relatives and friends each day. ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: An appeal for a kidney dialysis machine was launched for a Mrs.Lawson, a village resident. The machine was purchased at a cost of 5650 pounds for use in her home. 6 months later a suitable kidney donor was found and Mrs.Lawson was able to have a kidney transplant. She is now at home undergoing a course of anti-rejection medicine. ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
